lastly | we saw the capitol building .
output.sentences: Our town makes a big deal out of Independence day, with lots of colorful reenactments.
There are parades, races and many spirited events.
The flags are out in full force, of course.
Lots of people wear red, white and blue in their own interesting ways.
The state buildings are always beautiful in summertime, but we feel especially proud of them on our country's birthday.
